outfiles.control:
$title
QCEngine Turbomole
$operating system unix
$symmetry c1
$user-defined bonds    file=coord
$coord    file=coord
$optimize
 internal   off
 redundant  off
 cartesian  on
 global     off
 basis      off
$atoms
o  1                                                                           \
   basis =o def2-SVP
h  2-3                                                                         \
   basis =h def2-SVP
$basis    file=basis
$rundimensions
   dim(fock,dens)=352
   natoms=3
   nshell=12
   nbf(CAO)=25
   dim(trafo[SAO<-->AO/CAO])=27
   rhfshells=1
   nbf(AO)=24
$scfmo   file=mos
$closed shells
 a       1-5                                    ( 2 )
$scfiterlimit      150
$scfconv        8
$thize     0.10000000E-04
$thime        5
$scfdamp   start=0.300  step=0.050  min=0.100
$scfdump
$scfintunit
 unit=30       size=0        file=twoint
$scfdiis
$maxcor    500 MiB  per_core
$scforbitalshift  automatic=.1
$drvopt
   cartesian  on
   basis      off
   global     off
   hessian    on
   dipole     on
   nuclear polarizability
$interconversion  off
   qconv=1.d-7
   maxiter=25
$coordinateupdate
   dqmax=0.3
   interpolate  on
   statistics    5
$forceupdate
   ahlrichs numgeo=0  mingeo=3 maxgeo=4 modus=<g|dq> dynamic fail=0.3
   threig=0.005  reseig=0.005  thrbig=3.0  scale=1.00  damping=0.0
$forceinit on
   diag=default
$energy    file=energy
$grad    file=gradient
$forceapprox    file=forceapprox
$last step     dscf
$orbital_max_rnorm 0.30769395709238E-05
$last SCF energy change = -75.955370
$charge from dscf
         -0.000 (not to be modified here)
$dipole from dscf
  x     0.00000000000002    y    -0.00000000000000    z     0.85624894415066    a.u.
   | dipole | =    2.1763841798  debye
$end
